1. **Login & App Selection**: Access Salesforce via the lightning link. Ensure you are in the 'Agent Console Lightning' app via the 9-dot App Launcher.
2. **List View & Pinning**: Click the drop-down next to the List View name. Select 'My Open and Flagged with Reminder' and click the Pin icon to set it as your default view.
3. **Global Search**: Use the top Search Bar to find cases, orders, or contacts. View results in the summary panel on the left.
4. **Filtering Lists**: Use the 'Search this list...' bar to filter by customer name or email. Click column headers to sort by ascending/descending order.
5. **Opening Cases**: Click on the specific Case Number or Subject Line to open the record in a new tab.
